channel.title: Taverly - A New Experience
channel.description:
Hello everyone and thanks for checking out my project thread.
I worked on this server awhile back and even hosted it for some time before taking it down for a bit. I plan on continuing development on it now and will keep updating the progress on this thread, not sure if it will ever be hosted again.
[spoiler=New] [img]https://gyazo.com/16e2cdc70a0de983a65a1208a969f0be.gif[/img]
A better look of how the common scroll is going to work.
[img]https://gyazo.com/5e2e25dfa5687a08fa7c6b762be3d6a2.gif[/img]
A better look at how the common and rare mix scroll will work.
[img]https://gyazo.com/d2533b2d3729accf8239b660beab7901.gif[/img] [img]https://gyazo.com/0df5dd01cfbf80b3a988555a891a2ffc.gif[/img]
Faster and Slower look at the Rune-Gamble system.
[img]https://gyazo.com/097c86b4f6206f4f456c468b775fe2a3.png[/img]
The drop log has now been edited and will show you, and the other player's log in comparison.
[img]https://gyazo.com/559ebe1e425607b19fdf23ffa22ca9c9.png[/img]
A new interface has been made to display Barrows' Chest loots.
[img]https://gyazo.com/bdd3a68e0a86552b3b07fbc26daa2d1e.png[/img] A Rune-Gamble game has been added to be played for 500K bet or 1M bet, and goes as follows:
All runes have a certain worth, all runes are tallied up and the one with the best runes wins.
Points: [code] Air Rune - 1 Body Rune - 1 Water Rune - 1 Earth Rune - 1 Fire Rune - 3 Cosmic Rune - 4 Mind Rune - 4 Chaos Rune - 5 Nature Rune - 5 Law Rune - 6 Death Rune - 7 Blood Rune - 10[/code]
[img]https://gyazo.com/4b557a9137b32d16501f795ee2b4037e.gif[/img]
A new event that may be done through a everyday vote or some other way will allow players to roll for some commons and 'rare' items, the items displayed will not be the final items in the item tables.
[img]https://gyazo.com/696425f9698202e342a5d2a49d4c0aed.gif[/img]
How the Mysterious Ghost's boss coffer works.
[img]https://gyazo.com/faa7350d549400f1ebb33bf02a6d958a.gif[/img]
Using the Random Boss Generator. [/spoiler] [spoiler=OLD] [spoiler=Media] [img]http://gyazo.com/eee575a20c361242e1a23a22b7e88317.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/55f0a2ad9a2a0a0539efd0063a68df7a.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/742068d665de58f4ee75e98cdf844a84.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/2df6e140afb21482d4517e4771794de7.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/6f751f071b8978bae4949688f0343f2c.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/0fc7d9f9d2add12c81d562454d3042e1.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/5c16b281a75bd4683dd1736948560778.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/a1e69bd10242b854726bbcf7d5e3c8ec.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/edb9a0e3799b307c8f207171acba7965.gif[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/be56f86465366bde2e414a6d36c8b755.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/6675996ad03353f7051a81996f556433.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/20f0f6b126c776bdd64db64271927215.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/993930bd4d9bdd8a9feb6d6250902601.png[/img]
[/spoiler] [SPOILER=Update]The Kendal - Boss Requires Silver Weaponry to kill (Silver bolts, Silver sickle), which can now be made.
Drops: Imbuing Liquid - use on any of the Dagannoth Rings to imbue them to give them a new effect. Berserker Ring (i): Boosts Strength Level to the same amount that a normal Strength potion would. Warrior Ring (i): Boosts Strength, Attack, Defence Levels to the same amount that a normal Strength, Attack, Defence potion would. Archer Ring (i): Boosts Range Level to the same amount that a normal Range potion would. Seers Ring (i): Boosts Magic Level to the same amount that a normal Magic potion would.
These options can be activated while wearing the ring.
Ring of the gods, tyrannical ring, and treasonous ring.
Trollheim teleport has been turned into Boss Teleports (2).
Smelting silver ore now works. Distance check added to both altars. Occult Necklace added to Archeologist drop table. Kraken pet added to Mysterious Ghost's drop table. 3 3rd-age weapons & Katana have been added to hard clue table. Big Pirate Hat and Spectacles have been added to medium clue table. Briefcase has been added to easy clue table. Royal has been added to the Crystal Key drop table. Barrows items will now drop on floor when not having enough space. Farming items will now drop on floor when not having enough space. A notification is shown when trying to move while preforming an action. Mysterious Ghost attack has been changed from multi to switching attackers. Skill guides have been added. Enchanted bolts have been buffed. Bank inventory/ equipment button added to client.
[img]http://gyazo.com/e943aebbc541f9067eba8c8beb447b9f.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/edf18d22280fe3a90ff0a050328356c8.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/365b96c5646ce9fa1625e9038aaf7eb8.png[/img]
This update includes:
New boss, New items. Lot of bug fixes and XP adjustments.
Some updates included today:
[img]http://gyazo.com/5a8170cab7210a55a6b580e36174be5c.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/de02851311f0a7efd7b6a0d4fc286182.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/b2b2cbdce17fe6c0e22a35b92748d190.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/478203de311dcec088ddc0bb4b4b2d50.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/6675996ad03353f7051a81996f556433.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/4f406768bc67c129e423029713a5c616.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/61663475102911ff755adf82916d6aa3.gif[/img]
This update includes, New Boss, New Items, fixed bonuses for items, Relekka Slayer Dungeon (with tasks), Cutting of gems into bolt tips, placing of tips onto bolts, and enchanting said bolts.
Some things around home have been moved around to create more room
First off, you will NEED this client update because the old one will no-longer show the correct NPCs.
This update introduces a new Slayer Cave which can be accessed by talking to Chaeldar:
[img]http://gyazo.com/c770279affdca55503e352156750623e.png[/img]
This cave holds many Slayer NPCs, but players can only kill the NPC's they been assigned.
New NPCs in this cave:
Smoke-devil: Drops Mystic Smoke Staff. Cave Horror: Drops Black Masks. Mithril Dragon: Drops Ecumential Keys, Armoured Dragon Bones, Crystal Halberd, and Chewed Bones. (also really good Dragon equipment).
[img]http://gyazo.com/fe3c0b6c7ba0aca76e1d56b58d883ae6.png[/img]
In other news... You can fish Manta at the Fishing Guild. Cooking and Goldsmith Gauntlets now give bonus xp in: Cooking and Smithing/Smelting. You can now open the Ore Box for sale in the Skilling Shop. You can now be assigned Farming skill tasks. You can now purchase Skilling Task Reset Scrolls.
More to come today. [/spoiler][/spoiler]

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

Hello everyone and thanks for checking out my project thread.

I worked on this server awhile back and even hosted it for some time before taking it down for a bit. I plan on continuing development on it now and will keep updating the progress on this thread, not sure if it will ever be hosted again.

Better look at the Rune-Gamble thing, with fast speed and slow.

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @CleanCut CleanCut
item.description:
@CleanCut wrote:

Idk I like things with some unique spins on them, theres too many servers out trying to be exactly like runescape :\

Good luck though!

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Looks classic good luck, might try it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

I like the website choice.

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

Dell:

Good luck

Thanks, Dell.

The beta is now ready, within a few hours the client link will be posted.

The only question I have now is should the beta start everyone out at level 3, or have them maxed? Since there is PROBABLY going to be a reset upon leaving the beta phase. (there will be one 100% if all players are maxed upon beta)

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

MicroZoft:

I really like the way this is starting to look. Keep it up! I’ll be sure to check it out when it’s ready.

Thanks man, it’s nice to get a following just from a project thread alone. The thread has been updated with the most recent updates I’ve done which includes but is not limited to:
Crafting, Fletching, Herblore, Barrows, and more.

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

I really like the way this is starting to look. Keep it up! I’ll be sure to check it out when it’s ready.

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

Yes, I actually noticed that error when I first took the .GIF so thanks. As for the twist this early on its hard to say what in the end we will have for our own twist, but I’m sure over time you’ll be able to eventually tell.

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Yeah I’m just going based on the pictures. What twist will your server have that will set you aside from others?

Btw I found a bug

The interface shows 76 coins but your inventory shows a different amount.

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

Thanks, but I’m not really trying to create a remake here.
“This server will have it’s own twist not relying on any specific era to load from.”

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Experience*

Lots of remakes like this so a lot of competition, good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Taverly - A New Experience
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

Hello everyone and thanks for checking out my project thread.

I worked on this server awhile back and even hosted it for some time before taking it down for a bit. I plan on continuing development on it now and will keep updating the progress on this thread, not sure if it will ever be hosted again.

[spoiler=New]

A better look of how the common scroll is going to work.

A better look at how the common and rare mix scroll will work.


Faster and Slower look at the Rune-Gamble system.

The drop log has now been edited and will show you, and the other player’s log in comparison.

A new interface has been made to display Barrows’ Chest loots.


A Rune-Gamble game has been added to be played for 500K bet or 1M bet, and goes as follows:

All runes have a certain worth, all runes are tallied up and the one with the best runes wins.

Points:

Air Rune - 1 Body Rune - 1 Water Rune - 1 Earth Rune - 1 Fire Rune - 3 Cosmic Rune - 4 Mind Rune - 4 Chaos Rune - 5 Nature Rune - 5 Law Rune - 6 Death Rune - 7 Blood Rune - 10

A new event that may be done through a everyday vote or some other way will allow players to roll for some commons and ‘rare’ items, the items displayed will not be the final items in the item tables.

How the Mysterious Ghost’s boss coffer works.

Using the Random Boss Generator.
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=OLD]
[spoiler=Media]












[/spoiler]
[SPOILER=Update]The Kendal - Boss
Requires Silver Weaponry to kill (Silver bolts, Silver sickle), which can now be made.

Drops:
Imbuing Liquid - use on any of the Dagannoth Rings to imbue them to give them a new effect.
Berserker Ring (i): Boosts Strength Level to the same amount that a normal Strength potion would.
Warrior Ring (i): Boosts Strength, Attack, Defence Levels to the same amount that a normal Strength, Attack, Defence potion would.
Archer Ring (i): Boosts Range Level to the same amount that a normal Range potion would.
Seers Ring (i): Boosts Magic Level to the same amount that a normal Magic potion would.

These options can be activated while wearing the ring.

Ring of the gods, tyrannical ring, and treasonous ring.

Trollheim teleport has been turned into Boss Teleports (2).

Smelting silver ore now works.
Distance check added to both altars.
Occult Necklace added to Archeologist drop table.
Kraken pet added to Mysterious Ghost’s drop table.
3 3rd-age weapons & Katana have been added to hard clue table.
Big Pirate Hat and Spectacles have been added to medium clue table.
Briefcase has been added to easy clue table.
Royal has been added to the Crystal Key drop table.
Barrows items will now drop on floor when not having enough space.
Farming items will now drop on floor when not having enough space.
A notification is shown when trying to move while preforming an action.
Mysterious Ghost attack has been changed from multi to switching attackers.
Skill guides have been added.
Enchanted bolts have been buffed.
Bank inventory/ equipment button added to client.



This update includes:

New boss, New items. Lot of bug fixes and XP adjustments.

Some updates included today:





This update includes, New Boss, New Items, fixed bonuses for items, Relekka Slayer Dungeon (with tasks), Cutting of gems into bolt tips, placing of tips onto bolts, and enchanting said bolts.

Some things around home have been moved around to create more room

First off, you will NEED this client update because the old one will no-longer show the correct NPCs.

This update introduces a new Slayer Cave which can be accessed by talking to Chaeldar:

This cave holds many Slayer NPCs, but players can only kill the NPC’s they been assigned.

New NPCs in this cave:

Smoke-devil: Drops Mystic Smoke Staff.
Cave Horror: Drops Black Masks.
Mithril Dragon: Drops Ecumential Keys, Armoured Dragon Bones, Crystal Halberd, and Chewed Bones. (also really good Dragon equipment).

In other news…
You can fish Manta at the Fishing Guild.
Cooking and Goldsmith Gauntlets now give bonus xp in: Cooking and Smithing/Smelting.
You can now open the Ore Box for sale in the Skilling Shop.
You can now be assigned Farming skill tasks.
You can now purchase Skilling Task Reset Scrolls.

More to come today.
[/spoiler][/spoiler]

Read full topic
